colors_breadcrumb.label__4: Breadcrumb background/gradient only for breadcrumb layouts 2 & 3

general.list_iso_rtl: ISO codes list for RTL languages
general.list_iso_rtl_info: Separate each language ISO code with a ','. Eg: ar, ha, he
general.list_iso_rtl_note: List out language ISO codes to automatically switch to RTL layout: ar:(Arabic); dv:(Dhivehi,Maldivian); ha:(Hausa); he:(Hebrew); ku:(Kurdish/Sorani); fa:(Persian/Farsi); ur:(Urdu); ps:(Pashto); yi:(Yiddish)

font_type.label: Font family
font_type.info: To use google fonts, add the font name. [Learn more](https://fonts.google.com/)
font_type.info_shopify_font: Optimize your website's performance by utilizing shopify fonts!
font_type.info_language: When configuring a language in the customization settings, it's important to also establish the same language preference within the administrative settings.

type_body_font.title: Body font
type_body_font.label: Shopify font
type_body_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_navigation_font.title: Navigation font
type_navigation_font.label: Navigation font family
type_navigation_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_button_font.info_1: Apply to all buttons except the 'add to cart' and 'buy it now' buttons.
type_button_font.info_2: Apply to the 'add to cart' and 'buy it now' buttons on the product detail page.
type_button_font.title: Primary button font
type_button_font.opacity_info: The value of Opacity ranges from 0.0 to 1.0, with lower values indicating higher transparency, and conversely, higher values indicating lower transparency.
type_button_font.label: Button 1 font family
type_button_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

font_size.label: Font size
font_size.info: Selecting a different font size can affect the accessibility of your store.

font_weight.label: Font weight
font_weight.info: Selecting a different font weight can affect the accessibility of your store.

typography.info_enable_border_title: Only applicable when the 'enable sticky heading' setting is disabled.
typography.info_title_enable_underline: Only applicable when banner block is added.
typography.info_view_all_style: Settings related to view all are not applied below when the block banner is added.
typography.view_all_info: Go to this link [find your icon](https://fontawesome.com/v5/search). Find the icon you want, then copy the SVG code and paste it here.
typography.logo_icon_info: Only applicable when the logo image is left blank. Go to this link [find your icon](https://fontawesome.com/v5/search). Find the icon you want, then copy the SVG code and paste it here.
typography.arrows_info_style_2: Applies when the 'wrap the sliders in between' option is selected.
typography.icon_width_info: Applicable when the text/icon display setting is set to icon
typography.icons_type_info: Only applicable when the 'icons type' setting is set to Icon.
typography.underline_info: This setting only works with the 'image fade in up' option of the hover effect setting above.
typography.text_on_the_right: Text on the right of image
typography.info_mobile_layout: Only applicable when the 'mobile layout' setting is set to slider.

header_block.option_1: Title left with view all left
header_block.option_2: Title left with view all right
header_block.option_3: Title center with view all left
header_block.option_4: Title center with view all right
header_block.option_5: Title center with view all below

header__14.info: Customization options are used to collect customization information for an item added to the cart. This information can be collected from the buyer on the product page and quick view. [Learn more](https://halosoft.gitbook.io/ella-documentation/theme-settings/general/customization-option)

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

close.label: Enable x-shaped cursor
close.info__1: An x-shaped cursor will appear when hovering over the background overlay.

swatch.title: Swatch
swatch.info__2: Advanced color: use color names or images in PNG format. Metafields: Use color codes or images in PNG format from metafields.

scroll_down_section.label__1: Scroll down to the next section

paragraph__1.content: Customization options are used to collect customization information for an item added to the cart. This information can be collected from the buyer on the product page and quick view.

product_varriant_size.label__4: Show the color name in the product name

product_quick_shop.label: Enable quick shop
product_quick_shop.info: Bulk is optimized for items purchased in higher quantities.

product_marquee.label: Marquee
product_marquee.info: 'Text' will be applied to all products. 'Sale text' and 'sale discount' will only be applied to products on sale.

settings.info_currency_format: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.
settings.info_1: Only available for stores with shopify payments. Link [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/payments/shopify-payments/multi-currency/setup)
settings.info_2: Don't choose all 3 options at the same time or combine shopify payment with others. Link [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/payments/shopify-payments/multi-currency/setup)
settings.paragraph_1: Separate your currency codes with a space. Use the ISO 4217 3-letter currency code. Click [here](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php) for a complete list of currency codes. Example: CAD USD.
settings.paragraph_2: For this functionality to work in your shop, you need to edit your money formats according to [these instructions](http://help.shopify.com/en/themes/customization/currencies). (Please specify where the money format is located.)

general.info: Only for input link for button.

general.label__3: Enter total order price to offer free shipping

product.label__4: Each position is separated by |. Example: blackburn, UK | melbourne, AU | sydney, AU
product.label__5: Each position is separated by |. Example: 20 minutes | 50 minutes | 2 hours

general.label__1: Show 'notify me' when out of stock
general.info: An email address identifies an email box to which messages are delivered.

countdown.name: Countdown
countdown.info: Countdown shows customers the period of time when the product is on the promotion. [Learn more](https://halosoft.gitbook.io/ella-documentation/theme-settings/countdown)

general.info__1: Please use this exact format: yyyy/mm/dd hour/minute/second. Example: 2024/12/4 0:0:00.

settings.info: Multi-level category filtering lets customers filter products using a 3-level dropdown. Each level updates based on the previous selection.

dynamic_browser.info: Change the browser title dynamically when the user changes tabs.

custom_js.info: To add custom JavaScript, in your online store, select the theme you want to add it to, then choose 'edit code'. In 'edit code', look for a file named 'custom.js' and add your custom JavaScript there.
custom_js.info__2: To add custom CSS, in your online store, select the theme you want to add it to, then choose 'edit code'. In 'edit code', look for a file named 'custom.css' and add your custom CSS there.

settings.info: Due to the lack of supported CSS, the banner animation settings won't be applied on safari

settings.time_interval: Time interval to show notification again
settings.info_time: Enter the number of minutes you want to show the notification after being closed. E.g: 30

popup_content.info: This popup content settings below are for link click action option 3: show popup

image.label: Logo image
image.info: A logo image with a transparent background is suitable.

icon.label: Icon
icon.info: If you want to use a loading bar or rolling option, remove the logo image.

breadcrumb.title: Breadcrumb

text.info: Only applicable when the layout setting is set to slider.

alignment.info__1: Applies when text blocks contain icons or images taller than the text or vice versa.

slider_layout.info__1: Not applicable when the 'make content full width' setting is selected.
slider_layout.info__2: Applies only when the 'show button as link' setting is enabled and the 'show text underline' setting is disabled.

arrows.position_vertical_mobile: Vertical position on mobile (unit % or px)

video.info_video_height: You can adjust the height of the video to fit with the slider image by percentage. Example: 30%, 47.25%, 51%.

categories.title: Title
categories.info__1: Upload images with the same name as the menu handle to show images for each category. [Learn more](https://halosoft.gitbook.io/ella-documentation/sections/all-sections-in-theme/slideshow#how-to-show-category-block-for-slideshow-like-on-the-supermarket-homepage)

image.info_1: Recommended image size: width x height (1880 x 720)px

image.name: Image

heading.info: A heading is required to display the menu.

social_media_link.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your [theme settings](/editor?context=theme&category=social%20media).

payment_type.info: When you choose "default", to add payment icons, go to your [payments settings.](/admin/settings/payments)

header__6.info_1: Enter the names of the menu items you'd like to show the new label. Separate items by commas.
header__6.info_2: Enter the names of the menu items you'd like to show the sale label. Separate items by commas.
header__6.info_3: Enter the names of the menu items you'd like to show the hot label. Separate items by commas.

menu_label.label: Show blink effect

parallax.info: This option only works when the 'enable on homepage' option is selected

logo.label__fixed: Logo image for sticky header/fixed header

vertical_menu.title: Vertical menu

header_icons.label__7: Show wishlist count in mobile menu

mega_menu.info__2: Enter the name of the menu item you would like to apply to this mega menu.

content.info: Not used for blog layouts: default, full width, & list

general.info: When selecting the 'infinite scroll' option, the section container will automatically be full width and have no padding.

filter.info__3: Input filter name to show rectangle style

filter.info__5: When using a name other than the label 'more filters,' please enter the label name according to the name you've set in this setting.

general.label__16: Text time font size on mobile

settings.enabled_sticky_button: Enable sticky checkout button on mobile
settings.enable_dropdown: Enable dropdowns for 'Shipping estimate' and 'Coupon code'

settings.info__2: Use for content center alignment only

grid.info: Use when infinite scroll is enabled

groups.link_info: Use when thumbnail action: direct to link

logo.label__1: Use image or text for logo

paragraph.content: To show "title" and "description", leave "message for your visitors" in admin preferences blank

header__12.paragraph: Trusted images display only verified, high-quality visuals on product pages, enhancing customer trust and supporting informed purchasing decisions. [Learn more](https://halosoft.gitbook.io/ella-documentation/theme-settings/general/trust-image)

header__17.paragraph: Shows available offline stores for the selected variant. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/fulfillment/setup/delivery-methods/pickup-in-store)

header__21.paragraph: Show variant-specific content in the description tab, providing tailored content based on the selected variant. [Learn more](https://halosoft.gitbook.io/ella-documentation/product-page/product-information/how-to-set-up-product-description-for-each-variant)

header__23.paragraph: The positive vibes bundle is a dynamic feature designed to encourage purchases by displaying motivational messages like '60 people purchased 2+ times' or '37 sold in the last 24 hours' in a continuously sliding format, creating urgency and boosting product demand. [Learn more](https://halosoft.gitbook.io/ella-documentation/product-page/product-information/positive-vibes-bundle)

header__24.info__1: Example: 'Order within the next [hour] to receive it. Estimated delivery is between [date_start] and [date_end]' or 'Order in the next [hour] to get this to you between [date_start] and [date_end]' or 'Order in the next [hour] to get it by [date_end]' or 'Order in the next [hour] to get it soon'
header__24.info__3: Use the 'MON','TUE','WED','THU','FRI','SAT' and 'SUN'. Separate exclude days with a comma (,).

general.label__1: Enable sticky product information on desktop/tablet

show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient form for gift card products
show_gift_card_recipient.info: Allows buyers to send gift cards on a scheduled date along with a personal message. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/add-gift-card-recipient-fields)

general.share_info: The share block can only be moved up or down when the 'Layout' setting is set to 'List of social media icons'.
general.breadcrumb_info: The breadcrumb position won't be changeable if style 1 is selected.
general.qty_info: The quantity block cannot be moved up or down if the 'Layout' setting is set to 'Fixed'.
general.custom_cursor_info: When the 'Enable custom cursor' setting is enabled, the Image Zoom feature will be disabled.
general.visible_content_height_info: When the total content height exceeds this limit, the 'Read more' button will appear.

image_behavior.label: Image behavior
image_behavior.info: 'Zoom on scroll' functions with 'Loading animation' enabled.

general.info_for_horizontal_vertical: Only applicable when 'Mobile layout' setting of tabs on section settings is set to 'Vertical'.
general.product_tab_source_info: Only applicable when 'Show content for' setting is set to 'Specific products using metafield'.
general.product_tab_key_info: Only applicable when 'Show content for' setting is set to 'Specific products using metafield' and 'Content source' setting is set to 'Product metafield key'. [Learn more](https://halosoft.gitbook.io/ella-documentation/product-page/product-information/product-tabs#setup-custom-tabs-by-metafields)

media.info__2: Not applicable when the media fit setting is set to original.
media.info__3: Only applicable to the portrait option of the product image ratio setting.

sold_in_last.info__1: Example: 3,5,6,7,8,10,12,15. Separate quantities with a comma (,).
sold_in_last.info__2: Example: 10,15,16,17,18,20,25,35. Separate hours with a comma (,).
sold_in_last.info__3: Example: 283, 100, 59, 11, 14, 185. Separate quantities with a comma (,).

variant_step_by_step.info: Customization options are used to collect customization information for an item added to the cart.
variant_step_by_step.info__1: Enter the name of the tab item you would like to apply to this size chart.
variant_step_by_step.info__2: Enter the name of the tab item you would like to apply to this color comparison.
variant_step_by_step.info__3: Enter the name of the tab item you would like to apply to this customization option.

share.options__2: Share icon on right of add to cart button
share.options__3: Share icon on right of product title

dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers will see their preferred option, like paypal or apple pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

next_prev_product.label: Show next/previous product
next_prev_product.info: Show the product of the next/previous product in the collection

size_chart.info__1: Only applicable when the Size chart type setting is set to Product type or Product vendor.
size_chart.info__2: Only applicable when the Size chart type setting is set to Custom image.
size_chart.info__3: Only applicable when the Size chart type setting is set to Custom page.

compare_color.label__2: Enable drag & drop images on desktop

sticky_add_to_cart.label: Enable sticky add to cart
sticky_add_to_cart.label__1: Always show sticky add to cart on Mobile
sticky_add_to_cart.info__1: Only applicable when the 'Style' setting is set to Style 1.

complementary.label: Complementary products
complementary.product_show_grid: Maximum products to show for grid layout
complementary.product_show_list: Maximum products to show for list layout
complementary.info__1: To select complementary products, add the search & discovery app. [Learn more](https://shopify.dev/themes/product-merchandising/recommendations)

settings.info_1: Only applicable when 'Show content for' setting is set to 'All products'.
settings.info_2: [Learn more about how to set up a custom tab using metafield](https://halosoft.gitbook.io/ella-documentation/product-page/product-information/product-tabs#setup-custom-tabs-by-metafields)

settings.block_info: When grouped product is selected: Product bundle will be disabled, buy buttons, variant picker, perks, and share blocks will be grouped inside the grouped product to avoid duplication. The grouped product should be Removed if the current set doesn't have any valid product handle added in the 'grouped_sub_product' metafield.

general.info: Containers are used to pad the content inside of them

text.info__1: You can enter the width in units of % or px. For example: 60% or 800px. If content width is left blank, the the content width will be 100% of the container holding the content.

content.label_bottom_info: This content will be displayed when clicking the 'read more' button.
content.read_more_info: The read more button is displayed when the second description setting is filled in.
content.read_less_info: This text will replace the text of the read more button when clicked.

settings.info__1: Default is 270px. You can enter the width in units of % or px. For example: 30% or 270px. If width is left blank, the content width will be 100% of the container holding the content.

general.paragraph__1: The sidebar displays when blocks with the prefix [Sidebar] are added.

settings.info: This setting is applied when the 'layout' setting selects the 'slider'
